cells.data:
1. If you don’t have it, clone the https://github.com/videojs/docs repo
  2. If you do have the repo, be sure to sync
  3. Switch to the master branch if not there
  4. Open Terminal and navigate to the top level directory of your local copy
  5. Run => grunt
  6. You will see a bunch of XML validation issues regarding unclosed attributes and such, but ignore them - as long as grunt finishes, all should be well
  7. Commit changes back to docs
  8. Switch to gh-pages branch
  9. Update gh-pages branch from master
